content.p: Associate Lecturer, Have vast experience of 22 years in the field of Mathematics in local and private higher learning institutions in Malaysia ranging from UK based and US based UG programs Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia University of Nottingham Malaysia DULN001(B) telephone: +6 03 8924 8000 fax: +6 03 8924 8005 course enquiries: +6 03 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays)
